description: Enable AI agents to interact with Liveblocks by creating, modifying, and deleting rooms, threads, comments, notifications, and more. Provide AI with read access to Liveblocks Storage and Yjs for enhanced collaborative capabilities. Simplify integration of Liveblocks features into AI workflows for real-time collaboration and data management.

capabilities.name: get-active-users
capabilities.description: Get a Liveblocks room's active users

capabilities.name: broadcast-event
capabilities.description: Broadcast an event to a Liveblocks room

capabilities.name: get-yjs-document
capabilities.description: Get a Liveblocks Yjs text document

capabilities.name: create-thread
capabilities.description: Create a Liveblocks thread. Always ask for a userId.

capabilities.name: edit-thread-metadata
capabilities.description: Edit a Liveblocks thread's metadata. `null` can be used to remove a key.

capabilities.name: mark-thread-as-resolved
capabilities.description: Mark a Liveblocks thread as resolved

capabilities.name: mark-thread-as-unresolved
capabilities.description: Mark a Liveblocks thread as unresolved

capabilities.name: create-comment
capabilities.description: Create a Liveblocks comment. Always ask for a userId.

capabilities.name: add-comment-reaction
capabilities.description: Add a reaction to a Liveblocks comment

capabilities.name: remove-comment-reaction
capabilities.description: Remove a reaction from a Liveblocks comment

capabilities.name: get-room-subscription-settings
capabilities.description: Get a Liveblocks room's subscription settings

capabilities.name: update-room-subscription-settings
capabilities.description: Update a Liveblocks room's subscription settings

capabilities.name: delete-room-subscription-settings
capabilities.description: Delete a Liveblocks room's subscription settings

capabilities.name: get-user-room-subscription-settings
capabilities.description: Get a user's room subscription settings

capabilities.name: trigger-inbox-notification
capabilities.description: Create a custom Liveblocks inbox notification
